titleStmt.title: Captured in Prayer from the Benefits of the Psalms: Nathniel of Shirzor’s Cause of the Psalms

revisionDesc.change: CREATED: This bibl record was autogenerated from a Zotero record.

analytic.title: Captured in Prayer from the Benefits of the Psalms: Nathniel of Shirzor’s Cause of the Psalms

biblStruct.note: Nathniel of Shirzor is a late 6th/early 7th-century East Syriac writer, whose surviving biographical data and works are investigated and presented in four parts in this paper: 1) a detailed examination of Nathniel’s life and works, 2) an introduction to and exploration of his Cause of the Psalms, an introductory treatise to the book of Psalms and his only surviving work, 3) an annotated edition of this text (produced from all known, accessible manuscripts containing this text), which will supersede Bernhard Vandenhoff’s 1899 edition, which is based on a faulty (now inaccessible) manuscript, and 4) an English translation of the edited text.

body.bibl: Stadel, Seth. “Captured in Prayer from the Benefits of the Psalms: Nathniel of Shirzor’s Cause of the Psalms.” Le Muséon 135:1-2 (2022): 93–110. https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.2143/MUS.135.1.3290653.

Seth Stadel, Captured in Prayer from the Benefits of the Psalms: Nathniel of Shirzor’s Cause of the Psalms,” Le Muséon 135:1-2 (2022): 93–110, https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.2143/MUS.135.1.3290653.
